analysis.description:
SmartRouletteToken.returnTempTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x2a650356bd894370cc1d6aba71b36c0ad6b3dc18.sol#363-372) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _temp_balance[recipient].tokens_count == 0
SmartRouletteToken.standard should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0x2a650356bd894370cc1d6aba71b36c0ad6b3dc18.sol#5-6)
